resources.string: my name is farhan hasbi,i usually called farhan,I was born in Depok January 20, 2002, i in Vocational High School Taruna Bhakti majored in software engineering,i hope i can be professional web developer

DiCoding is a program specifically designed for application developers in Indonesia, with various classes (\'Academy\') that can be studied online, challenges (\'Challenges\') that can be worked on, and activities (\'Events\') that can be followed. For each challenge completed, the application developer will be given points that can be exchanged for prizes according to the DiCoding and XP catalog which are \'Reputation\'. Events and Academy may have points or XP, but their value varies. I studied in DiCoding for a year, there I learned about Java and Android Beginners
